summary.para: Enables the credential provider to set status messages as it attempts to complete .

param.name: psz
param.para: A pointer to the status message.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: The Logon UI will display the status message during . This is especially useful during lengthy attempt to connect to inform the user of the status and continued attempts.

summary.para: Exposes methods that provide a standard mechanism for credential providers to call while attempting to connect to the network to determine if they should continue these attempts. Credential providers can also use this interface to display messages to the user while attempting to establish a network connection.

remarks.para: This interface also provides the methods of the interface, from which it inherits.
